title: Notwithstanding the provisions in (iv) above, the slum dweller society / NGO / Developer undertaking the scheme may opt to claim TDR in lieu of sale component available for the scheme, on account of constraints such as height restrictions, uneconomical site conditions, etc
clause_text: Notwithstanding the provisions in (iv) above, the slum dweller society / NGO / Developer undertaking the scheme may opt to claim TDR in lieu of sale component available for the scheme, on account of constraints such as height restrictions, uneconomical site conditions, etc.; if the full permissible FSI cannot be used on the same site, TDR may be allowed as may

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
